Reviews.Title: Great Seller and Great Product
Reviews.Author: Songorocosongo
Reviews.Content: I did a good research and was thinking about getting this camrea or a Canon T3i. This deal was one of the factors that made me buy this one. Everything is good quality and the camera feels great. I was a little used to my mother's D90 so this one feels smalle, lighter and just using it takes some getting used to. I live in Puerto Rico and everything came in one box and surprisingly 2 days earlier than supposed. Could not be happier. From now on Cameta Camera will be on my top list

Reviews.Title: Great camera for beginners
Reviews.Author: ST
Reviews.Content: I was thinking of making a switch from the point and shoot camera to a SLR, and this camera proved to be a perfect fit for this transition....I could easily see the huge difference in picture quality while not worrying too much about details of photography.....the camera has a variety of advanced features for those more interested in advanced levels....

Reviews.Title: Love my new Nikon!
Reviews.Author: mark
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this camera and package! Everything that I was hoping for. I did a lot of research on many cameras and found this to be an excellent product at this price level. Easy to use, great pictures,Can't really comment on any negatives as I am a new DSLR user.

Reviews.Title: The camera is great. Thank you very much.
Reviews.Author: jmagallanes
Reviews.Content: The camera is great. Just in the future I need to buy other lens to cover all possibilities.Thank you very much.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: cheryl Adams
Reviews.Content: We love it  very happy with itnow just to add the extra's can't wait for the trip to az this summer

Reviews.Title: Great Value!
Reviews.Author: Archie Grant
Reviews.Content: Great deal on the entire kit, I did wish there were more instructions that came with the lenses but overall for the price compared to other stores this product kit was phenom!

Reviews.Title: Great product...
Reviews.Author: Eddy Chance
Reviews.Content: Great product... looking forward to using it every day... lots of great new features... arrived on time and as advertised.
